titleStmt.title: By the Lords Justices of Ireland, a proclamation. Sydney, Tho. Coningsby. Whereas several Irish papists within this kingdom notwithstanding the grace and favour extended to them by their Maiestys gratious declaration and the protection they enjoyed under their government have most ungratefully relapsed into their former rebellious courses ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
Coningsby, Thomas Coningsby, Earl, 1656?-1729.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook, assignee of Benjamin Tooke, printer to the King and Queens most excellent Majesties; and are to be sold on Ormonde-Key,

notesStmt.note: "Given at their Majesties castle of Dublin this 18th day of Septem. 1690.".
Papists not to leave thier parishes.--Steele.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
